name: Green Circle
description:
Click Click Click!!

Click the green circle not the red!!

This is just my new project, using Game Maker.

It's simple to play it,  all you had to do in this game is just click at the green circle, and you will get 50points, but if you click at the red circle you will lost 50points :(

well, why don't you trying to play it, get the high score and give me a feedback? i'm sure that will help me a lot for further update of this game.

and again, sorry for my bad english
